channel.title: Carla RAI Challenge on Carla RAI Challenge 2023
channel.description: Recent content in Carla RAI Challenge on Carla RAI Challenge 2023

item.title: Contact Information
item.description: Please contact us at carla_rai@oxfordrobotics.institute if you have any questions or need more information.

item.title: Credits
item.description: Sponsors This challenge builds upon the previous Carla Challenges, utilising some of their codes as boilerplates and adapting contents from their sites. We thank the Carla team their support. We also thank AWS for providing us with AWS credits to run this challenge. Partners

item.title: RAI Paper
item.description: We are writing a paper to motivate the need for objective means for assessing autonomous driving agents and provide a few technical details. A link shall be provided here soon!
